courses.title: Install Consul service mesh on Kubernetes
courses.description: Install Consul service mesh on Kubernetes in a hosted sandboxed interactive environment

courses.title: Deploy services to Consul service mesh on Kubernetes
courses.description: You will deploy two services into Consul's service mesh running on a Kubernetes cluster. The two services will use Consul to discover each other and communicate over mTLS with sidecar proxies. This is the first step in deploying an application into a zero-trust network.
